Row.Text: It will bring me joy to see your sails on the horizon.
It pains me to say no to your friendship, but I must.
The sea is vast and empty. Shall we be friends?
Excellent!
You make me sad.
What have I done to offend you so? Oh well, it is too late to fix this mistake. How regrettable, that we must go to war.
I have declared war against you. I did not want to do this, but I don't want you around anymore, either.
Your delegation was well received. We drank green wine and listened to the mournful fadistas sing of the sea.
You are sending gifts to an over-saturated market. We don't want any.
Імперія морів несе спеції з Індії, шовки з Китаю та золото з Африки. І не лише це.
Were you sent by the devil to torment me? Why do you sow such discord wherever you go?
Чому ваш народ - наче іржа світу? Ваші слова - брехня, а ви - пихаті й зарозумілі!
Милістю божою, перед вами Жуан ІІІ - Король Португалії. Вітаю вас.
We have a feast of olive oil and codfish, grilled sardines and castella! Will you come and listen to the fado with me?
Yes.
Let us exchange stories about our travels, and of our homes.
I see you have returned.
О, так. Нам обом відома туга за морем.
Як ви можете сидіти на березі та нічого не робити?
Shall we sail together?
We welcome peace. It is a shame that it could not have come sooner.
War is lamentable. But we cannot yet have peace.
Let us make marketplaces out of battlefields.
We wish your people well on their journeys.
I am sorry, but we cannot stand your troops moving through our lands.
May we sail in your waters and walk your roads?
Please, move your troops unless something calamitous might happen.
I am sorry, but our plans necessitate placing our troops where they are.
Agreed. My forces will sail elsewhere.
I am told that you are the conqueror of Portugal. That may be the reality, but I will never recognize your victory. Begone!
Я не можу з цим погодитись.
Зроблено! Ви знаєте як сприяти нашому процвітанню.
